techniques.name: Perfect Parry
techniques.description: Parry at the last possible second to perform a deadly counterattack. Generates Resolve.

techniques.name: Perfect Healing Parry
techniques.description: Recover a moderate amount of health when performing a Perfect Parry.

techniques.name: Deflect Arrows
techniques.description: Block incoming arrows while holding L1.

techniques.name: Unyielding Sword Parry
techniques.description: Parry unblockable attacks (blue glint) from Mongol swordsmen.

techniques.name: Unyielding Spear Parry
techniques.description: Parry unblockable attacks from spearmen.

techniques.name: Resolved Parry
techniques.description: Gaining resolve by successful parry or perfect parry is increased.

techniques.name: Terrifying Parry
techniques.description: Perfect Parry has a chance to terrify nearby enemies.

techniques.name: Roll
techniques.description: Double tap Circle to roll across the ground and evade attacks.

techniques.name: Dodge Slash
techniques.description: Attack immediately after a dodge to perform a quick counter-strike.

techniques.name: Sprint Strike
techniques.description: Perform a quick slash while sprinting.

techniques.name: Shoulder Charge
techniques.description: Ram into enemies while sprinting to knock them back.

techniques.name: Delayed Strike
techniques.description: Hold quick attack to unleash a delayed, more powerful strike.

techniques.name: Mounted Strike
techniques.description: Perform a jumping attack from your horse.

techniques.name: Perfect Dodge
techniques.description: Dodge at the last second to perform a deadly counterattack.

techniques.name: Heavenly Strike
techniques.description: A quick, unblockable attack that dashes across the battlefield. Costs 1 Resolve.

techniques.name: Dance of Wrath
techniques.description: Unleash three consecutive unblockable attacks that deal massive damage. Costs 3 Resolve.

techniques.name: Way of the Flame
techniques.description: Ignite your katana with incendiary oil to burn enemies and break their guard.

techniques.name: Explosive Arrow
techniques.description: An arrow fitted with a black powder tip that explodes on impact.

techniques.name: Wind of Health
techniques.description: Guiding Wind tracks Hot Springs.

techniques.name: Wind of Resolve
techniques.description: Guiding Wind tracks Bamboo Strikes.

techniques.name: Wind of Charms
techniques.description: Guiding Wind tracks Shinto Shrines.

techniques.name: Wind of Inari
techniques.description: Guiding Wind tracks Fox Dens.

techniques.name: Wind of Vanity
techniques.description: Guiding Wind tracks discovering vanity gear.

techniques.name: Standoff
techniques.description: Challenge enemies to a duel before combat begins. One hit kill.

techniques.name: Standoff Streak
techniques.description: Challenge two enemies successfully in a Standoff.

techniques.name: Improved Standoff Streak
techniques.description: Challenge three enemies successfully in a Standoff.

techniques.name: Archery
techniques.description: Slow down time while aiming with a specialized concentration technique.

techniques.name: Concentration
techniques.description: Briefly slow time while aiming the bow (R3).

techniques.name: Mental Fortitude
techniques.description: Reduces cooldown of Concentration by 15%.

techniques.name: Improved Mental Fortitude
techniques.description: Reduces cooldown of Concentration by 30%.

techniques.name: Assassination
techniques.description: Quietly kill an unaware enemy.

techniques.name: Safe Landing
techniques.description: Roll just before landing to take no damage from high falls.

techniques.name: Chain Assassination
techniques.description: Assassinate two targets in quick succession.

techniques.name: Chain Assassination Master
techniques.description: Assassinate three targets in quick succession.

techniques.name: Shoji Assassination
techniques.description: Assassinate an enemy through a paper door.

techniques.name: Ghost Stance
techniques.description: Enter a state of fear-inducing power. Kills enemies in one hit. Charge by killing leaders or 7 enemies without taking damage.

techniques.name: Kunai
techniques.description: Throw small blades at nearby enemies to stagger them.

techniques.name: Hidden Blades
techniques.description: Throw two additional Kunai.

techniques.name: Serrated Blades
techniques.description: Kunai deal double damage.

techniques.name: Black Powder Bomb
techniques.description: Blast that deals damage and staggers enemies.

techniques.name: Concussive Blast
techniques.description: Black Powder Bombs knock down enemies.

techniques.name: Smoke Bomb
techniques.description: Vanish from sight and leave enemies confused.

techniques.name: Blinding Dust
techniques.description: Smoke Bombs last longer and blind enemies.

techniques.name: Healing Incense
techniques.description: Smoke Bombs restore some health.

techniques.name: Sticky Bomb
techniques.description: Adheres to an enemy and explodes after a delay.

techniques.name: Guarded Throw
techniques.description: You are immune to blast damage from your own Sticky Bombs.

techniques.name: Wind Chime
techniques.description: Distract guard dogs and enemies.

techniques.name: Firecracker
techniques.description: Throw a firecracker to attract multiple enemies.
